```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r}
rm(list=ls())
ECDC <- read.csv("./DATA/COVID-19-ECDC-2020-07-19.csv")
ECDC$dateRep <- gsub("/","-",ECDC$dateRep)
ECDC$dateRep <- as.Date(ECDC$dateRep,format="%m-%d-%Y")

UK <- ECDC %>% select(countriesAndTerritories,dateRep,year,month,cases,deaths,popData2019
) %>% filter(countriesAndTerritories=="United_Kingdom")

colnames(UK) <- c("Countries","Reported","Year","Month","Cases","Deaths","Population")  

```

## COVID-19 For Great Britian: Daily Cases and Deaths

```{r}
UK %>% ggplot() + geom_line(aes(x=Reported,y=Cases)) +
  labs(title="United Kingdom COVID-19 Daily Cases")

UK %>% ggplot() + geom_line(aes(x=Reported,y=Deaths)) +
  labs(title="United Kingdom COVID-19 Daily Deaths")
```
